title: Stopped giving a shit in ranked, hilarity ensued.
body:
Stopped caring about my rank and started playing ranked for fun instead, as per the title some hilarious shit started happening, for instance the mere fact i played 10 games of adc soraka and only lost 1 should be an indicator.

Or how about the fact that i bought hecarim, played my first game as him in the support role.

Proceeded to proclaim myself thrillho and trash the competition with a rapid fire cannon and e flash auto turret dives for the fuck of it.

Basically apparently if you want to win games in bronze, stop trying, just let your brain melt and go with the flow.

replies.body: you know people can see everyones match histories.....i wouldnt point this out if OP wasnt obviously lying. lost half his raka games, only half have any stupid troll builds (anything but support items), all but 2 games he fed, 50% chance of being right about your first hecarim game too, but nope, you actually lost that one too. hes a dick for encouraging troll picks for ranked but hes probably just a sad lonely little boy. proved OP wrong, is gonna either tell me to stfu, rage at me, change the subject, pretend to laugh at my match history because i dont have a 100% win record, or just ignore this post. hilarity ensued

i played 3 raka games this week.

lost 1 of them.

4 games lost in a row? 4 dc's.

Legit mate, learn to read the timelines so you dont get shrekt.

also my first hec game i was 1/0 if i recall while my adc was 0/3 or something like that, and the riven and jinx decided to build 6 tear of the goddess and feed, at which point i got gangbanged 10 times inside my own base.

So i dont count that game as it was 3v7

Basically im aware you can see my match history, i also dont value your opinions as you lack the ability to actually read a match history.

Your idea of reading match histories is "did you win, did you die"

My idea of reading a match history is "did you win, ok did did you die, ok lets go deeper and find out WHY you won/lost, WHY you died/didnt die.
LAWWWWLLL damn you really went all out on this. theres no hope for you son

I just climbed out of b5 with nothing but hecarim bot lane and adc soraka.

where is your god now.
b4 your still in the bottom of players

im halfway to b3 as we speak. only lost 1 game.

Spoke too soon, just had a team where the top lane was pushed into enemy tower and crying for ganks all game because he kept getting ganked. (meanwhile i had their jg and his top lane ganking me all game but atleast im not a cry baby and didnt moan about it)

A feeding tristana.

A trynd jungle who couldnt get an objective for the life of him.

And a sona who did nothing but bitch and moan about the tristana.

Clusterfuck = 2nd loss.
Think like a potato to outsmart the potatoes.
Just enough potato to be potato flavoured.
AD Bananas lmaoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo you legit won 9 games with it?

might have over exaggerated a bit but i do have a 66% winrate with ad banana.

Winrate has gone over 75% with ad banana.

Praise the banana people.
